title: Reasons for Stopping Clozapine
itunes:title: Reasons for Stopping Clozapine
description:
Why do patients stop clozapine? 
This episode discusses clozapine discontinuation rates and reasons for doing so among patients who later recommenced clozapine therapy. 

Faculty: Jim Phelps, M.D. 
Host: Jessica Diaz, M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 0.5 CMEs: Quick Take Vol. 38
  • Demographic and Clinical Characteristics of Patients Who Recommence Clozapine Following Therapy Interruptions
